about_the_game:
Red Impact is a planetary defence game with massive battles and a hint of resource management.

As humanity expands out amongst the stars, a mysterious force threatens destruction. There is no fleet, only you, to save these worlds from certain doom. Do you have what it takes to face the threat? Is there something far more evil out there waiting beyond the stars?



Defend your planets
Strategise from all angles in this complete 360⁰ tower defence. Enemies come in many forms, from annoyingly fast and small drones to sluggishly gigantic capital ships. You will need to employ different strategies to deal with each threat!



Build your weapons
Place your weapons and defences. Focus on your economy? Go on the offence with as many turrets as possible? or go full defensive?
Extract resources between the enemy onslaught. Does your planet have no atmosphere or the nearby sun is highly active? Build a Solar Energy Station to support your weapons, especially the energy-hungry laser.



Upgrade your systems
Improve railguns and laser damage, rate of fire, speed, missiles and more to pulverise your enemies into stardust.
To keep annihilating your enemy, you must upgrade your buildings as planets can suffer from Kepler-syndrome, be barren, unstable, materially dense and more, each with unique challenges.



Compete for the high score
Tear ships apart, watch planets burn and experience the campaign of over 5 planets and dozens of missions or beat your friends at the high score in an endless mode with unique challenges per planet biome.

Key Features

  • Build and Upgrade powerful offensive weapons and defences.
  • Defend the entire surface of your planet.
  • Extract resources.
  • Hunt for a high score and try to beat your friends.
  • Multiple planets, each with missions, underlying narrative and different play-styles.
  • Unlock Weapons/Perks & Powerups in the campaign.
